page.title: 11Sports in the Newburgh Area
page.content: Every year we have School Sports in the School field.We have obstacle courses,basketball,skipping,running etc.There is a badge for 1st,2nd and 3rd.There is no swimming pool in Newburgh but many people from the village go to the nearest swimming pool in Ellon.The swimming pool in Ellon is joined onto the Academy there.The swimming pool has underwater lighting as well as normal lighting. There is a diving board.The pool is 25m long and 1m to 2m in depth.Many Galas are held in Ellon.In Newburgh the Community Club runs Badminton, Gymnastics and Judo.There is a nine hole golf course in Newburgh which is used by locals as well as tourists or visitors.The estuary of the River Ythan is used by Wind-surfers.At one of the local hotels there is a Petanque Court for competitions.
